00004 def _toggle_state(state):
00005     if state == 'off' or not state:
00006         return False
00007     else:
00008         return True
00009 
00010 def _check_type(var, name, type):
00011     if not isinstance(var, type):
00012         raise TypeError, 'variable "%s"=%s is not of %s' % \
00013               (name, var, str(type))
00014     else:
00015         return True

00017 def _check_size(a, a_name, expected_size):
00018     if isinstance(expected_size, int):
00019         expected_size = (expected_size,) 
00020     if shape(a) != expected_size:
00021         raise ValueError, '%s has shape %s, expected %s' % \
00022               (a_name, a.shape, expected_size)

00024 def _check_xyzv(*args):
00025     nargs = len(args)
00026     if nargs == 1:
00027         x, y, z = [None]*3
00028         v = asarray(args[0])
00029     elif nargs == 4:
00030         x, y, z, v = [asarray(a) for a in args]
00031     else:
00032         raise ValueError, "_check_xyzv: wrong number of arguments"
00033 
00034     try:
00035         nx, ny, nz = shape(v)
00036     except:
00037         raise ValueError, '_check_xyzv: v must be 3D, not %dD' % len(shape(v))
00038 
00039     if x is None and y is None and z is None:
00040         x, y, z = meshgrid(seq(nx-1), seq(ny-1), seq(nz-1))
00041     else:
00042         assert shape(x)==(nx,ny,nz) or shape(x)==(nx,1,1) or shape(x)==(nx,), \
00043                "_check_xyzv: x has shape %s, expected %s, %s, or %s" % \
00044                (shape(x), (nx,ny,nz), (nx,1,1), (nx,))
00045         
00046         if shape(x) == (nx,ny,nz):
00047             assert shape(y) == shape(z) == (nx,ny,nz), \
00048                    "_check_xyzv: x has shape %s, expected same for y and z" % \
00049                    shape(x)
00050         elif shape(x) == (nx,1,1):
00051             assert shape(y) == (1,ny,1), \
00052                    "_check_xyzv: x has shape %s, expected y to be %s, not %s" \
00053                    % (shape(x), (1,ny,1), shape(y))
00054             assert shape(z) == (1,1,nz), \
00055                    "_check_xyzv: x has shape %s, expected z to be %s, not %s" \
00056                    % (shape(x), (1,1,nz), shape(z))
00057         else: # shape(x) == (nx,)
00058             assert shape(y) == (ny,), \
00059                    "_check_xyzv: x has shape %s, expected y to be %s, not %s" \
00060                    % (shape(x), (ny,), shape(y))
00061             assert shape(z) == (nz,), \
00062                    "_check_xyzv: x has shape %s, expected z to be %s, not %s" \
00063                    % (shape(x), (nz,), shape(z))
00064         
00065     return x, y, z, v
00066 
00067 def _check_xyz(*args):
00068     nargs = len(args)
00069     if nargs == 1:
00070         x, y = [None]*2
00071         z = asarray(args[0])
00072     elif nargs == 3:
00073         x, y, z = [asarray(a) for a in args]
00074     else:
00075         raise TypeError, "_check_xyz: wrong number of arguments"
00076     
00077     try:
00078         nx, ny = shape(z)
00079     except:
00080         raise ValueError, "z must be 2D, not %dD" % len(shape(z))
00081 
00082     if x is None and y is None:
00083         x, y = meshgrid(seq(nx-1), seq(ny-1))
00084     else:
00085         assert shape(x) == (nx,ny) or shape(x) == (nx,1) or len(x) == nx, \
00086                "_check_xyz: x has shape %s, expected %s, %s, or %s" % \
00087                (shape(x), (nx,ny), (nx,1), (nx,))
00088         
00089         assert shape(y) == (nx,ny) or shape(y) == (1,ny) or len(y) == ny, \
00090                "_check_xyz: y has shape %s, expected %s, %s, or %s" % \
00091                (shape(y), (nx,ny), (1,ny), (ny,))
00092         
00093     return x, y, z
00094     
00095 def _check_xyuv(*args):
00096     nargs = len(args)
00097     if nargs == 2:
00098         x, y = [None]*2
00099         u, v = [asarray(a) for a in args]
00100     elif nargs == 4:
00101         x, y, u, v = [asarray(a) for a in args]
00102     else:
00103         raise TypeError, "_check_xyuv: wrong number of arguments"
00104 
00105     us = shape(u)
00106     assert us == shape(v), "_check_xyuv: u and v must be of same shape"
00107     
00108     if len(us) == 1:
00109         if x is None and y is None:
00110             x = seq(us[0]-1)
00111             y = seq(us[0]-1)
00112         else:
00113             assert shape(x) == us, \
00114                    "_check_xyuv: x has shape %s, expected %s" % (shape(x), us)
00115             assert shape(y) == us, \
00116                    "_check_xyuv: y has shape %s, expected %s" % (shape(y), us)
00117     elif len(us) == 2:
00118         nx, ny = us
00119         if x is None and y is None:
00120             x = seq(nx-1)
00121             y = seq(ny-1)
00122         else:
00123             assert shape(x)==(nx,ny) or shape(x)==(nx,1) or shape(x)==(nx,), \
00124                    "_check_xyuv: x has shape %s, expected %s, %s, or %s" % \
00125                    (shape(x), (nx,ny), (nx,1), (nx,))
00126             assert shape(y)==(nx,ny) or shape(y)==(1,ny) or shape(y)==(ny,), \
00127                    "_check_xyuv: y has shape %s, expected %s, %s, or %s" % \
00128                    (shape(y), (nx,ny), (1,ny), (ny,))
00129     else:
00130         raise ValueError, \
00131               "_check_xyuv: u must be 1D or 2D, not %dD" % len(us)
00132         
00133     return x, y, u, v
00134 
00135 def _check_xyzuvw(*args):
00136     nargs = len(args)
00137     if nargs == 4:
00138         x, y = [None]*2
00139         z, u, v, w = [asarray(a) for a in args]
00140     elif nargs == 6:
00141         x, y, z, u, v, w = [asarray(a) for a in args]
00142     else:
00143         raise TypeError, "_check_xyzuvw: wrong number of arguments"
00144 
00145     us = shape(u)
00146     assert us == shape(v) == shape(w), \
00147            "_check_xyzuvw: u, v, and w must be of same shape"
00148     
00149     if len(us) == 1:
00150         if x is None and y is None:
00151             x = seq(us[0]-1)
00152             y = seq(us[0]-1)
00153         else:
00154             assert shape(x) == us, \
00155                    "_check_xyuv: x has shape %s, expected %s" % (shape(x), us)
00156             assert shape(y) == us, \
00157                    "_check_xyuv: y has shape %s, expected %s" % (shape(y), us)
00158         assert shape(z) == us, \
00159                "_check_xyuv: z has shape %s, expected %s" % (shape(z), us)
00160     elif len(us) == 2:
00161         nx, ny = us
00162         if x is None and y is None:
00163             x, y, z = _check_xyz(z)
00164         else:
00165             x, y, z = _check_xyz(x, y, z)
00166         assert shape(z) == us, \
00167                "_check_xyzuvw: z, u, v, and w must be of same shape"
00168     elif len(us) == 3:
00169         nx, ny, nz = us
00170         if x is None and y is None:
00171             x, y, junk = meshgrid(seq(nx-1), seq(ny-1), seq(nz-1))
00172         else:
00173             assert shape(x)==us or shape(x)==(nx,1,1) or shape(x)==(nx,), \
00174                    "_check_xyzuvw: x has shape %s, expected %s, %s, or %s" % \
00175                    (shape(x), us, (nx,1,1), (nx,))
00176             assert shape(y)==us or shape(y)==(1,ny,1) or shape(y)==(ny,), \
00177                    "_check_xyzuvw: y has shape %s, expected %s, %s, or %s" % \
00178                    (shape(y), us, (1,ny,1), (ny,))
00179         assert shape(z) == us or shape(z) == (1,1,nz) or shape(z) == (nz,), \
00180                "_check_xyzuvw: z has shape %s, expected %s, %s, or %s" % \
00181                (shape(z), us, (1,1,nz), (nz,))
00182     else:
00183         raise ValueError, \
00184               "_check_xyzuvw: u must be 1D, 2D, or 3D, not %dD" % len(us)
00185 
00186     return x, y, z, u, v, w
